articles.title: Sacha Baron Cohen, Isla Fisher announce divorce after 13-year marriage
articles.description: Actors Sacha Baron Cohen and Isla Fisher announced their divorce Friday after more than 20 years together. The couple, who married in 2010, share two daughters and a son.
articles.content:
Sacha Baron Cohen and Isla Fisher on Friday announced their divorce, a move that the longtime couple indicated had been in the works for a while.
